alert.note: Alert for Chilton; Coosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 06 at 4:05AM CDT until October 07 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT ON SATURDAY FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM ACROSS PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL ALABAMA... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT SATURDAY FOR DRY FUELS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES ACROSS PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL ALABAMA... The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a Red Flag Warning for dry fuels and low relative humidity values, which is in effect from 11 AM to 7 PM CDT Saturday. * WINDS...North 10 to 15 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of a dry air mass and breezy conditions will result in critical fire weather conditions. Outdoor burning is not recommended. * IMPACTS...The combination of a dry air mass and windy conditions will result in critical fire weather conditions. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
